Is this a cam? Because that's all I've been able to find so far.
dvd released on 11th april just wait a little while longer.....

Seeing as I'm blind, I can't comment on the video quality, but the audio is perfect for a stereo version! It's not the line audio, and the end credits are not cut down, so I suppose this must be some kind of early dvdrip, pity that tha audio is not 5.1

The video quality is very bad, I'd give it a 5. Audio is decent, an 8. Yes, I know the DVD comes out April 11, but there is almost always a DVD-quality version out way sooner than that. Unfortunately, that's not the case for this movie, or Little Fockers.

Anyone an idea about when the bloody dvdrip will appear at last? The DVDRip of Angels & Demons was release THREE MONTHS before the acutal release in the US! HP7 will be released in less than a month, so it's about time for a dvdrip!

Audio 7 Video 3-4
Thanks for the up Murlok, but will wait for a better rip.
